name: Münster's 'Anglia II Nova Tabula' (1540)
description: First separately printed map of England. By Sebastian Münster for his Geographia (1540). Oriented with east at top. Key lists 17 important English places.
notes:
Sebastian Münster (1488-1552), cosmographer and professor at Basel.
First published in Geographia (1540), later in Cosmographia (1544+).
Oriented with East at top. Extends to Edinburgh, shows Irish east coast.
NLS has this in their England & Wales collection.
Also on Flickr: https://www.flickr.com/photos/reciclassicat/39706787350
